results.content:
This course is fairly good in that it covers the basics of HTML 5 and how to use some important HTML tags though examples on the fly, so any mistakes present are cleared up as the tutor presents the course topics.
Sound is ok and visually the videos are a good standard.

results.content: Es un curso muy muy básico de html, no incluye nada de html5 a parte del nuevo doctype.

results.content:
This course is all about HTML5, if you're a beginner in web designing then I will highly recommend you to enroll in this course. You should must keep in mind that this course is only for beginners not experts. I was already know these things and I was looking for something new in HTML5 but didn't find here but this course is complete for you if you're looking to learn HTML5.

Thanks

results.content: This course is a good starter for HTML5.  First few chapters are quite familiar to any HTML dev. But the second half of the course is informative and provides enough foundation to built upon with using HTML5. Thanks Shivam :)

results.content: Good Basic Overview of HTML thank you :)
